create_new.title: Create new project
create_new.text: Choose the development language for this project, and give it a name:

create_new_file.title: Create new file
create_new_file.text: Enter the new file name and extension (only files with .cpp, .c or .S extensions will be compiled).

rename_file.title: Rename this file?
rename_file.text: Enter the new file name and extension (only files with .cpp, .c or .S extensions will be compiled).

restore_default_project_settings.title: Restore default project settings?
restore_default_project_settings.text: Your current project settings will be restored to defaults. There is no undo.

restore_default_IDE_settings.title: Restore default IDE settings?
restore_default_IDE_settings.text: Your current IDE settings will be restored to defaults. There is no undo.

shutdown.title: Shut down Bela?
shutdown.text: Bela will disconnect from the IDE and shutdown gracefully.

update.title: Update Bela
update.text: Select your Bela update (will be a ZIP file).

about.title: About Bela
about.text: Bela was born out of research at Queen Mary University of London. It is developed and supported by the Bela team, and sold by Augmented Instruments Ltd in London, UK. For more information, please visit bela.io.

overwrite.title: Overwrite file?
overwrite.text: already exists in this project. Overwrite?
overwrite.tick: Don't ask me again this session

discard.title: Discard changes?
discard.text: This will discard all changes since your last commit. There is no undo.

file_changed.title: File changed on disk
file_changed.text: has changed. Would you like to reload it?

tabs.includeInstructions: Copy & paste at the top of each .cpp file in your project.

editor_view.preview: This is a preview - these objects are not editable in the browser.

settings_view.update: Beginning update - this may take several minutes
settings_view.browser: The browser will temporarily disconnect, and may become unresponsive
settings_view.ide: Do not use the IDE during this process
settings_view.zip: This is not a valid zip archive.

console.messages: Your code is printing to the console too quickly. Check your audio thread for print messages.
console.disconnect: Bela has disconnected. Any changes you make will not be saved. Check your USB connection and reboot Bela.

ide_browser.mode_switch: mode switch detected on the audio thread.
ide_browser.mode_switches: mode switches detected on the audio thread.
ide_browser.file_changed: This file was edited in another window and has changed. Reopen the file to make edits.
ide_browser.zip_error: There was a problem updating Bela. Make sure you have selected the correct zip file and try again.
